title: Oakland Athletics average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2018.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 24.46 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 24.13 was reached at Year 2018
